abstract: The draft minutes for the meeting are said to have included a recommendation to cancel the license.
snippet: The draft minutes for the meeting are said to have included a recommendation to cancel the license.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, June 1  A Russian committee delayed a decision on Friday on whether to revoke the license for a major natural gas field held by a BP joint venture, though draft minutes for the meeting are said to have included a recommendation to cancel the license.

headline.main: Russian Panel Delays Vote on Revoking BP Gas Field License
headline.print_headline: Russian Panel Delays Vote on Revoking BP Gas Field License
